channel.title: 1v1 Arena
channel.description:
Essentially what it would be is an area that people are thrown into to fight.
You'd also be able to make 'bets'. So, it's like dueling, but for the pking scenario.
Here are some of the things that can be toggled: God spells p2p/f2p alter border (the area will have a small non-wild area)
What options am I missing?

item.title: 1v1 Arena
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

this was done before, where edge was white and the pking was done by throwing snow balls at each other that hit upwards of 8.

Read full topic

@cleako wrote:

It exists in the RS2 317 client…

Read full topic

item.title: 1v1 Arena
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:32, topic:417445”][quote author=A Gh0st link=topic=519999.msg3787008#msg3787008 date=1318971331]

They could be set to spawn on the ground in various snowy areas to be collected and sold.

Yeah that’s what I was thinking. Add temporary snow mounds in popular places on the map.
[/quote]What popular places actually have a snowy terrain?[/quote]
What I meant to say was that I’d envision it something similar to how RS2 does Christmas events. Change the landscape color to look like snow. The snow mound would be inserted manually in places like Edgeville. Players can left click the snow pile for an inventory of snowballs, with which they can throw at other players. What would be really cool would be if someone could make it look like snow was actually falling on the client.

Read full topic

item.title: 1v1 Arena
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

cleako:

I can see snowballs, rotten tomatoes, eggs, cabbage, potatoes, and cheese being usable objects to throw at someone that would not appear in their inventory. Eggs would finally have a purpose other then baking.

Snowballs would be a fun feature to add for sure.

Read full topic

item.title: 1v1 Arena
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:24, topic:417445”][quote author=cleako link=topic=519999.msg3786743#msg3786743 date=1318950108]
With Yong Min’s code from Noobscape 3, you can throw gnome balls. You can take that framework and quickly devise tomatoes that could be thrown. Just don’t let them arrive in the victim’s inventory.
[/quote]It’s just a projectile with a different id…[/quote]
Should kittens be a wieldable ranged weapon? What should be used to fire them at people?

Read full topic

This is actually a good idea. I especially like the idea of throwing tomatoes. Haha.

item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

IMO, make a moparcsape tournament. give people 2 weeks to signup, make a ladder, them pair up people to fight, all using same stats, weps, armor, food, same rules etc and simply see who is the best pker around.

item.title: 1v1 Arena
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

maybe level limit toggle if the server were to be a point based server. like lets say you hit 50 defense limit toggle and the characters
can’t go above level 50. Range only fight. Unique character counter, like a small minigame where you get a unique token from beating
a character. When let’s say you get 10 you turn it in and get a chance for a random item or something. Once you get used the unique
token you can beat the person again for another unique token. Also yes the tomato thing was just me messing around.

Read full topic
